existing_features.title: Update the Image Resize mode tabs so that the "Target Size" tab uses a different background color styling than the "By Pixels" and "By Percentage" tabs (especially for the active state), while keeping the tab labels as "By Pixels", "By Percentage", and "Target Size".

new_feature_requests.summary: Update UI for Target Size controls: add/adjust 'By Pixels' and 'By Percentage' options and change the Target Size button background color
